summary: Alternative schools may offer a different educational approach to serve expelled students or others whose needs typically can’t be met in a regular school. We looked at how 15 states hold alternative schools accountable for academic performance. All 15 states used at least one indicator that researchers and studies consider useful for assessing alternative schools. For example, 11 states used college and career readiness indicators...
title: K-12 Education: Information on How States Assess Alternative School Performance
